post.description:
Authenticates user credentials and returns access token. Process varies based on account status:
     *     - If email not verified: Returns error and sends verification code
     *     - If 2FA enabled: First attempt sends OTP, second attempt requires OTP code
     *     - If all verified: Returns access token immediately

two_factor_code.description: Required only if 2FA is enabled. Get code from /2fa/send-otp endpoint

message.example: Email not verified. A new verification code has been sent to your email.
Two-factor authentication code is required. Please check your email.

post.description: Creates a new user account and sends email verification code. The user must verify their email before being able to login.

message.example: Successfully registered. Please check your email to verify your account.
The email has already been taken.
Failed to create user account. Please try again.
Account created but failed to send verification email. Please request a new verification code.

post.description: Revoke the current access and refresh tokens
Get a new access token using refresh token. The old tokens will be revoked.

refresh_token.description: The refresh token received during login

post.description: Send a password reset code to user's email. The code expires after 60 minutes.

email.description: Email address of the account to reset

message.example: Password reset code has been sent to your email
No user found with this email address
Failed to process password reset request

post.description:
Reset user's password using the code sent to their email. The code must be valid and not expired. 
     *     After successful reset, all existing tokens will be revoked.

message.example: No user found with this email address

items.example: The password must be at least 8 characters.

post.description:
Change password for authenticated user. All existing tokens will be revoked, requiring re-login. 
     *     A notification will be sent to user's email.

password.description: New password (min 8 characters, must be different from current)

items.example: The password must be at least 8 characters.

post.description:
Verify user's email address using the verification code sent to their email. 
     *     The code expires after 60 minutes.

Send a new verification code to authenticated user's email. Previous code will be invalidated. 
     *     Limited to 6 requests per minute.

message.example: A new verification code has been sent to your email
Previous verification code is still valid
Too many verification requests. Please try again later.

get.description:
Check if user's email is verified and if a verification code is currently active. 
     *     Used to determine if user needs to verify email or request a new code.

verification_sent.description: Whether there is an active verification code

post.description:
Send a new verification code to user's email without requiring authentication. 
     *     Previous code will be invalidated. Limited to 6 requests per minute.

email.description: Email address to send verification code

message.example: A new verification code has been sent to your email
Previous verification code is still valid
No user found with this email address
Too many verification requests. Please try again later.
